content.prompt: Which of the following is true about the structure of the prokaryotic cell represented in the figure?

choices.label: It has a diploid genome and contains linear DNA.
It has a cell wall exterior to the plasma membrane and contains ribosomes.
It possesses membrane-bound organelles and a flagellum.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
